content: There\'s a quote that says \'Technology is a useful servant but a dangerous master.\' After pitching the AR urban exploration app to the museum, I realized how true that is. If we can make history come alive in a way that connects people, we\'re serving the community. But if we let tech dictate our experiences without soul, we might miss the magic of human connection. Missed a chance to explore this with my date, too caught up in the pitch.
